page.title: 13TEMPLE FARM.
page.content: The farm keeps sheep and cows.There are fourteen cade lambs that they feed on the bottle.At the farm there are seven buildings and two of them are brick buildings where they milk their four cows.They also buy store cattle and calves (that means that they buy them, fatten them up and sell them). They have one worker and Mr Truelove who lives on the farm,and his brother both work on the farm as well.The crops that they have are Wheat,Oats, Barley and Sweetcorn Maize which they forage harvest themselves and load into big trailors and take it into a big pit where it is stored, ready for the winter feed.
